title: SEAL's Lost Dream
description: Previously published in the SEALed With a Kiss anthology. This book is not for readers under 18.  Former Navy SEAL K9 Handler Joe Flynn doesn’t understand why every stray in Denver seems to head his way. After losing his Military War Dog in Afghanistan, he doesn’t want anything to do with animals. But he doesn’t mind seeing Willow take care of his charges. Lusciously rounded, she’s the best thing he’s experienced all year.  Veterinarian Willow James loves seeing Flynn walk her way, though he brings her some truly sad cases of animal neglect. He tries to keep his emotions locked away, but she’s learned to read him over the past year. When one of the animals he brings in decides to adopt him, she starts to see the thaw she’s been waiting for.  She’s ready to take on the sexy former SEAL with all his ghosts, but is he ready to let them go for her?
author: J.M. Madden
